member.name: ID2D1SvgDocument.CreatePaint
member.summary: Creates a paint object which can be used to set the 'fill' or 'stroke' properties.
member.param: Specifies the type of paint object to create.
The color used if the paintType is D2D1_SVG_PAINT_TYPE_COLOR.
The element id which acts as the paint server. This id is used if the paint type is D2D1_SVG_PAINT_TYPE_URI.
When the method completes, this will contain a pointer to the created paint object.
member.returns: This method returns an HRESULT success or error code.

member.name: ID2D1SvgDocument.CreatePaint
member.summary: Creates a paint object which can be used to set the 'fill' or 'stroke' properties.
member.param: Specifies the type of paint object to create.
The color used if the paintType is D2D1_SVG_PAINT_TYPE_COLOR.
The element id which acts as the paint server. This id is used if the paint type is D2D1_SVG_PAINT_TYPE_URI.
When the method completes, this will contain a pointer to the created paint object.
member.returns: This method returns an HRESULT success or error code.

member.name: ID2D1SvgDocument.CreatePathData
member.summary: Creates a path data object which can be used to set a 'd' attribute on a 'path' element.
member.param: An array of segment data.
Number of items in segmentData.
An array of path commands.
The number of items in commands.
When this method completes, this points to the created path data.
member.returns: This method returns an HRESULT success or error code.

member.name: ID2D1SvgDocument.CreatePointCollection
member.summary: Creates a points object which can be used to set a points attribute on a polygon or polyline element.
member.param: The points in the point collection.
The number of points in the points argument.
The created object.
member.returns: This method returns an HRESULT success or error code.

member.name: ID2D1SvgDocument.CreateStrokeDashArray
member.summary: Creates a dash array object which can be used to set the stroke-dasharray property.
member.param: An array of dashes.
Size of the array in th dashes argument.
The created .
member.returns: This method returns an HRESULT success or error code.

member.name: ID2D1SvgDocument.Deserialize
member.summary: Deserializes a subtree from the stream. The stream must have only one root element, but that root element need not be an 'svg' element. The output element is not inserted into this document tree.
member.param: An input stream containing the SVG XML subtree.
The root of the subtree.
member.returns: This method returns an HRESULT success or error code.

member.name: ID2D1SvgDocument.FindElementById
member.summary: Gets the SVG element with the specified ID.
member.param: ID of the element to retrieve.
The element matching the specified ID. If the element cannot be found, the returned element will be null.
member.returns: This method returns an HRESULT success or error code.

member.name: ID2D1SvgDocument.GetRoot
member.summary: Gets the root element of the document.
member.param: Outputs the root element of the document.

member.name: ID2D1SvgDocument.GetViewportSize
member.summary: Returns the size of the initial viewport.
member.returns: Returns the size of the initial viewport

member.name: ID2D1SvgDocument.Serialize
member.summary: Serializes an element and its subtree to XML. The output XML is encoded as UTF-8.
member.param: An output stream to contain the SVG XML subtree.
The root of the subtree. If null, the entire document is serialized.
member.returns: This method returns an HRESULT success or error code.

member.name: ID2D1SvgDocument.SetRoot
member.summary: Sets the root element of the document.The root element must be an svg element. If the element already exists within an svg tree, it is first removed.
member.param: The new root element of the document.
member.returns: This method returns an HRESULT success or error code.

member.name: ID2D1SvgDocument.SetViewportSize
member.summary: Sets the size of the initial viewport.
member.param: The size of the viewport.
member.returns: This method returns an HRESULT success or error code.
